attributes.action: Lower the age for smear tests from 25 to 18 to prevent cervical cancer.
attributes.additional_details:
I personally feel that as a young woman, we aren’t educated on how important it is to catch cancer in its early stages
I want every woman to be protected because cancer doesn’t discriminate against age. You could be 80, 50, 30 or even 16. So please vote for this petition so we can save lives!
attributes.background:
I am making this petition because I want to make a difference to all woman living in the UK.

I am 21 years old and believe that the age of screening should be lowered to age 18.
